What do we do?


Incident Reporting

We provide incident reporting tool. We cover emergencies like dengue, haze and other emergencies such as fire, terrorist attack, gas leak, natural disaster etc. If you know of any of such incident, you can report it through our website.

What to do in times of crisis?


Run

Move quickly and quietly away from danger using the safest route

Do not surrender or attempt to negotiate

Hide

Stay out of sight, be quiet and switch your phone to silent mode

Lock yourself in and stay away from the doors

Tell

Provide information to our call centre operator by calling 991 or file an incident here

Provide details about the attacker and their location
